overview: Hot brothers in law Roman Todd and Jaxton Wheeler tell their wives they're going on a hunting trip so they can steal away for some uninterrupted sex -- with each other. While staying at a lodge in the mountains they meet sex crazed hotel workers Brandon Wilde and Kory Houston, and soon the young studs are plotting to seduce them. A sexy, lighthearted farce with intense, passionate sex scenes that will leave you breathless.
title: His Hot Brother In Law
